list.textDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the currency "{name}"?

detail.placeholderPrecision: Enter number of decimals to be displayed...
detail.notificationErrorMessage: An error occurred while saving your currency.
detail.notificationCountryErrorMessage: An error occurred while saving your country currency settings.
detail.emptyCountryRoundings: Add individual decimals and rounding factors for different countries.
detail.emptyCountryRoundingsNewCurrency: Fill in basic information, save the currency - then add values
detail.taxFreeFromHelpText: If the shopping cart total is higher than the value set in "Tax-free from", the whole shopping cart will be tax-free. Applies to  shopping carts payed in "{currencyName}", only.

currency-country-modal.countryAlreadyAssigned: The country has already a setting for this currency.

price-rounding.headerWarning: Different rounding intervals - Be sure to check back with your individual service providers to avoid accounting problems.
price-rounding.headerInfo: Tax calculation is based on unrounded totals. Occuring rounding differences are not subject to tax calculation.
price-rounding.helpTextDecimals: Decimals indicate the maximum number of digits after the decimal separator.
price-rounding.helpTextInterval:
Use rounding intervals to account for markets where the lowest physical denominations of the currency have been abolished and cash roundings are in place.

Hint: Select "None" if you don't want to apply any price rounding. E.g. when utilising decimals larger than 2.
price-rounding.helpTextRoundForNet: Activate rounding for net customer groups additionally.
price-rounding.tooltipIntervalDisabled: Price rounding is not applied if decimals larger than 2 are configured.
